history.proof: intros P H1 H2. apply Classical_Pred_Type.not_all_not_ex in H2 as [n Hn]. exists n. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: apply Classical_Pred_Type.not_all_not_ex in H2 as [n Hn].
exceptions.tactic: apply H1 in Hn as [HP | HnP].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n : nat, P n \\/ ~ P n" on hypothesis of type "P n".

original: intros P H1 H2. apply Classical_Pred_Type.not_all_not_ex in H2 as [n Hn]. apply H1 in Hn as [HP | HnP]. - exists n. apply HP. - contradict HnP.
